resources.string: Answer all questions, then click on the \'Submit\' button.
1. Whose arrest sparked the Montgomery Bus Boycott in the US?
2. A group of civil rights workers who took bus trips around Southern State in 1961 to protest bus segregation are called
3. Who among the following is a leader of the nonviolent civil rights movement fighting for inclusion and equality?
4. What is the name of the Southern US Laws designed to enforce segregation of Blacks from Whites?
5. What is the full meaning of NAACP?
National Art of Ailment Control and Protection
National Association for the Advancement of Coloured People
Natural Act for Artisans in Carlifornia and Philadelphia
6. The Black Panther Party was founded in what year?
7. Which of these cities is iconic for MLK\'s Struggles?
8. Where did Malcom X Omowale join the \"Nation of Islam\"?
9. Which of the following are heroes of the Civil rights struggle? (Select all that applies)
10. Whose quote is this? \"I saved a thousand slaves, I would have saved a lot more if only they knew they were slaves!\ (Correct spelling and spacing is important.)"
